name: INfeCted: The Game
description:
INfeCted is a hyper-casual game that is packed with a lot of action. Take control of destroying the viruses ONE CLICK at a time. Dominate the Virus and save the entire world from being INfeCted.

Features:
- Over 20 Levels or 20 Countries more on the way.
- Over 4 Mini Games.
- Many Achievements To Beat.
- Change Color Of BackGround.
- Four Languages (English, Spanish, Portuguese, and Italian) With More To Come.
- Earn Daily Rewards.
- Upgrade Power-Ups.
